text: Arau tomalokara majata yisakale aisbaryasali arau praacuryara adhikarai te'omloke yena e'i buli sapata grahana nakarae ye, sihamte atmiya-sbajana, abharagrastaka arau allahara raastata hijaratakarai sakalaka ekorae pradana nakaraiba; te'omloke yena sihamtaka ksama karai diye arau sihamtara dosa-trauti upeksa karae. Tomaloke nibicaraa neki ye, allahe tomalokaka ksama karaka? Arau allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
